entry.title: TYMO AQUA (U.S. Only)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tymo Beauty
Type: Beauty and Personal Care
Price: 99.99

The very first heating tool that HYDRATES your hair!

Sounds hard to believe? TYMO AQUA fulfills the wonder with the most innovative and patented Zeolite Technology. The curler absorbs water from the air and releases millions of aqua ions and anions during heating.

Nano ions can penetrate deeply from the surface into the core of hair, therefore, reduces more than 80% possible heat damage while hydrating hair, resulting healthy and natural shininess.

In short, a Sauna spa treat (expect real steam) towards glowing finish look!

A custom-blend 1.25-inch large titanium barrel (size matters for bouncy curlers) ensures a smoother glide, reducing 50% of breakage comparing to traditional ceramic barrel, meanwhile allows an accurate unique profile based on your hair texture, color and chemical treatments, leaves glamorous finish look that just won’t quit.

* The default plug of this product is U.S. standard, if you order from other countries, you may need an adapter.

What is included:

  • AQUA curling iron ×1
  • Travel bag ×1
  • Hair pins ×2
  • Glove ×1

Product Features:

  • Patented zeolite technology hydrates hair and protects from heat damage while styling
  • 360° aqua ions and anions hair care treatment
  • Nano titanium coating for even heat distribution and fast heating in 50s
  • 60 mins auto off
  • Intelligent thermostat technology ensures stable temperature, prevent from unnecessary heat damage
  • 5 precise temperature options for different hair conditions (280°F – 430°F)
  • 360°swivel power cord
  • International dual voltage 100V - 240V
  • 1-year warranty

entry.title: TYMO ROTA
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tymo Beauty
Type: Beauty and Personal Care
Price: 99.99

“Clamp, Rotate, Release ”, TYMO ROTA is that EASY for anyone even with zero hair style experience!Ends clamped, button pressed, consider your perfect bouncy curl is done!

This one of a kind automatic rotating curler can create both inner and outer waves, it takes just one pass to effortless frizz-free curls, full head styling time within 10 mins.

Enhanced with built-in ionic technology, the TYMO ROTA is designed with 5 customized heat settings from 280°F – 430°F and a smart microchip that keeps temperature fluctuations in check 50 times per second.

A custom-blend nano titanium barrel ensures a smoother glide, reducing 50% of breakage comparing to traditional ceramic barrel, meanwhile allows an accurate unique profile based on your hair texture, color and chemical treatments without unnecessary heat damage.

The results? Smooth, soft, healthy-looking waves that just won’t quit.

* The default plug of this product is U.S. standard, if you order from other countries, you may need an adapter.

What is included:

  • ROTA curling iron ×1
  • Travel bag ×1
  • Hair pins ×2
  • Glove ×1

Product Features:

  • Patented dual rotation technology creates bouncy curls in minutes
  • Nano titanium coating for even heat distribution and fast heating in 50s
  • 60 mins auto off
  • Intelligent thermostat technology ensures stable temperature, prevent from unnecessary heat damage
  • 5 precise temperature options for different hair conditions (280°F – 430°F)
  • Built-in Ionic System to smooth hair, minimize frizz, long lasting the style
  • 360°swivel power cord
  • International dual voltage 100V - 240V
  • 1-year warranty

entry.title: TYMO AIRFLOW
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tymo Beauty
Type: Beauty and Personal Care
Price: 99.99

Experience revolutionary technologies with TYMO AIRFLOW.  Symbolic 2-in-1 Hair Curler & Straightener designed for all hair types and easily creates bouncing curls and straight sleek looks in a matter of minutes! Unique floating V-shape opening featuring, 88 ionic tiny air vents with 360°cool airflow-circling can achieve long-lasting hairstyling in 5 adjustable temperatures. TYMO AIRFLOW brings technology, beauty and safety at the same time, enjoy the gorgeous salon-like finish from day to night!

* The default plug of this product is U.S. standard, if you order from other countries, you may need an adapter.

What is included:

  • TYMO 360°Airflow Styler ×1
  • Clip ×2
  • Travel bag ×1
  • Heat-proof glove X1

Product Features:

  • Revolutionary Airflow Styler Technology with 88 tiny Ionic air vents and 360°cool airflow-circling
  • 5 adjustable precise temperature settings from 284°F-428°F
  • PTC Heating Technology - fast heat-up to 428°F within 50 seconds
  • Tourmaline coating provides even and stable heat and reduces heat damage
  • Floating cylindrical and rectangular heating plate design
  • International dual voltage 110-240V

entry.title: TYMO HIGHSPEED
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tymo Beauty
Type: Beauty and Personal Care
Price: 199.99

TYMO HIGHSPEED is a state-of-the-art professional dryer that combines exceptional power, performance and salon-perfect results. This exquisite and light weight device (298g only) is equipped with powerful BLDC digital motor, that generates the powerful high speed airflow. It also produces a uniquely calibrated blend of ion-enriched air and focused air velocity to rapidly dry and style hair.

TYMO HIGHSPEED is designed with MCH + Ionic technologies innovated to protect hair from extreme heat damage, with fastest drying and controlled styling to help increase smoothness, increase shine and decrease frizz and flyaway.

4 precise heat settings, 3 speed settings, one-button cold shot that all controlled with a LCD display, and 3 magnetic styling nozzles (1 diffuser for more visible curl; 1 smoothing nozzle to smooth hair while drying; 1 styling concentrator to create a blade of air for perfectly styling), to enables multiple long-lasting style for every hair type.

Unique one-button air reversal design with auto cleansing feature, plus removable filter case, any dirt in the filter can be easily blown and wiped off. Get ready with TYMO and enjoy your new experience of hair drying and styling.

*Apply in 120V use only, orders are only available for U.S. and Canada.

What is included:

  • Hypersonic hair dryer×1
  • Diffuser ×1
  • Smoothing nozzle ×1
  • Styling concentrator ×1
  • Cleaning brush ×1

Product Features:

  • 4 precise temperature options for different styling purposes( cold shot/140°F/175°F/210°F)
  • 3 air flow speed for all hair types
  • 20m/s air speed, 40L/s air flow, allows drying time as quick as 5mins
  • 30 Million Negative Ions to reduce frizz and keep your hair silky all day long
  • One-button air reversal design with auto cleansing feature
  • LCD display
  • 120V~60Hz, 1200W
  • 1-year warranty

entry.title: TYMO RING PLUS
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tymo Beauty
Type: Beauty and Personal Care
Price: 69.99

Introducing the upgraded version of the most beloved hair straightener that delivers styling personalization like never before. TYMO RING PLUS uses advanced technology to completely reimagine your styling experience.

Equipped with Nano Titanium Coating & 9 Temp Settings, TYMO RING PLUS flexibly adjusts heat to your unique profile, based on your hair texture, length and color treatments.

Fast Heating & Denser 3D Teeth reaches to the roots and allows quicker performance that saves you from morning rash.

Built-in Ionic System delivers smooth, shiny results and less damage in a single pass. Locks your style without overexposing hair to unnecessary heat.

entry.title: TYMO VOLUMIZER
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tymo Beauty
Type: Beauty and Personal Care
Price: 69.99

TYMO VOLUMIZER is the professional one-step hair styler. This multi-functional hot air brush is designed to deliver gorgeous volume and brilliant shine at the same time.

The product can be used as a blow dryer, volumizer, straightener, and curler.

With the 1100W powerful motor TYMO VOLUMIZER can efficiently dry wet hair. The unique 360° vent offers a 50% bigger surround drying area to fast dry hair and create salon long-lasting hairstyles in minutes, saving your time.

Titanium barrel and ionic technology create volume at the root and sleekness along the hair shaft while a mix of long and short bristles detangle, smooth and minimize breakage.

Adjustable heat settings provide a customized blowout that works for every hair type.

 

*Apply in 120V use only, orders are only available for U.S. and Canada.

What is included:

  • Hot air brush×1

Product Features:

  • 3 temperature options for different hair types(115℉-230℉)
  • Titanium barrel generates negative ions and infrared heat to smooth hair and minimize frizz
  • Oval barrel is designed to deliver extra root lift and increase overall volume
  • 360°swivel power cord
  • 120V~60Hz, 1100W
  • 1-year warranty

entry.title: TYMO RING-PINK
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tymo Beauty
Type: Beauty and Personal Care
Price: 59.99

TYMO RING is the new generation hair straightener. We've sold 500,000+ units in the U.S. market. It is the top-selling straightening brush since 2019. with TYMO RING, you save more time when straightening your hair. It can be transformed to straight when just brushing. The Anti-Scald design allows you to reach more roots of your hair. Comparing the traditional straightening irons, TYMO RING provides you better results (shiny, healthy, silky hair) with more volume. 

 * The default plug of this product is U.S. standard, if you order from other countries, you may need an adapter.

  • 60 seconds fast heat up
